about_the_game:
Legends Reborn: Age of Chance is a card battler taking place in the fantasy realm of Tolkhiem. Where all manner of heroes create decks of cards and creatures to settle their differences on the tables with a game of chance. Mighty champions compete against each other in the grand arenas of Anchor Marsh or back alley taverns and everything in between. All seeking Glory, Fame, and Power. To be cheered on like a rock star or a conquering hero. To be a Legend.



Deck Building - Create your own unique deck from an ever expanding collection of Heroes, Creatures, and Cards. Heroes to provide you with game changing hero cards at key points during a match. Creatures to carry out attacks and create synergies with each other via passive abilities. Cards to manipulate the creatures on the board with status effects or calls to attack. Collect and combine these elements to create a strategy all your own.



Online PVP - Take your deck online to compete against friends and enemies alike. Rise through the leaderboards and tune your deck to a constantly evolving meta. Take on a never ending supply of opponents via a system of skill based matchmaking. So gather your courage, build your deck, and enter the Age of Chance to prove yourself a Legend and master of the game.
